meanings.definition: The living contents of a plant or bacterial cell, including the cytoplasm and nucleus.
meanings.sent1: The protoplasts of the cell contain the essential components for its survival.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study protoplasts to understand the inner workings of cells.
meanings.sent3: The protoplasts in the plant cell had a party, celebrating their vital roles.
meanings.sent4: The protoplasts function like a bustling city, with each part contributing to the whole.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the protoplasts appeared vibrant and full of life.

meanings.definition: A cell from which a plant or bacterial cell is derived.
meanings.sent1: The protoplasts divide and give rise to new plant cells.
meanings.sent2: During growth, protoplasts differentiate into specialized cells.
meanings.sent3: The protoplasts decided to take a vacation and let the new cells handle the work.
meanings.sent4: From the protoplasts of the seed, a mighty tree emerged.
meanings.sent5: Each protoplast carries the genetic information needed for cell development.
